title: Students can use MAGIC SLATE's features to: -ITALICIZE the title of the book

container-title: -INSERT and DELETE information and changes as needed
title: -BOLDFACE the headings of the main parts of the book report. (For example: title, author, summary, opinion). -DoubleSpace a draft copy for easy proofreading
Business classes can use MAGIC SLATE for letters of application, letters of inquiry, letters reporting information, and resumes
